<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}

></MethodEndpoint>

Archive Chat

<Heading id={"request"} as={"h2"} className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}>
  <Translate id="theme.openapi.request.title">Request</Translate>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails parameters={undefined}></ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{
    content: {
      "application/json": {
        schema: {
          type: "object",
          example: { chat: "51910398955@s.whatsapp.net", archive: true },
        },
      },
    },
  }}
></RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{

      description: "Successful response",

          schema: {
            type: "object",
            example: {
